title: NetEffectContribution for ComparativeEvidence: Bypass surgery effects on Myocardial infarction or stroke in Swedish Obese Subjects (SOS) study

variableDefinition.description: Inclusion criteria were age 37 to 60 years and a body mass index of at least 34 in men and at least 38 in women.  All in Sweden.
bariatric surgery vs. usual care without bariatric surgery

intended.display: GroupAssignment: Bariatric Surgery vs. no bariatric surgery

observed.display: OutcomeVariable: Nonfatal myocardial infarction or stroke

valueReference.display: Outcome Importance Rating of DichotomousIntendedOutcome: Nonfatal myocardial infarction or stroke  for StudyEligibilityCriteria: Eligibility Criteria for Bariatric Surgery Randomized Trial (Diabetes Surgery Study)
